    <descript>
      <abstract>This polygon layer represents the existing 2005 paved roads on Fairfax campus in George Mason University, VA ,</abstract>
      <purpose>The  data is intended for researchers, students, and others for reference and mapping purposes.  It may be used for any analysis related to campus incidents and tracing changes of the campus layouts.</purpose>
    </descript>
